definitions.definition: If an activity, situation, etc. involves something, that thing is a part of the activity, etc.:
examples: Research involving the use of biological warfare agents will be used for defensive purposes.

definitions.definition: If a situation involves someone or something, he, she, or it is affected by it:
examples: The second accident involved two cars and a lorry.

definitions.definition: to include someone in something, or to make them take part in or feel part of it:
examples: I prefer teaching methods that actively involve students in learning.
